detail_desc: Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links 1.5 cm, length of bracelet 23 cm.
Cable-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with a wide rib-knit polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Stocking stitched back.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and double, crossover elastic straps at the hem.
Oversized jumper in a soft, fine cashmere knit with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and a fuller cleavage, and ties at the back of the neck.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with buttons on one shoulder and long raglan sleeves.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Shorter mesh vest top with a print motif on the front layered over the top.
Oversized shirt in a cotton weave with a small collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a contrasting collar, button placket and cuffs. Concealed buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Loungewear in soft fabric with long sleeves, long legs and cuffed hems.
Thin, patterned socks with a short shaft.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in jersey made from a cotton blend. Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Sun hats in a soft cotton weave. Lined. Width of brim 5.5 cm.

Bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cropped top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, straight cut at the back and narrow shoulder straps.
Short, A-line dress in jersey crêpe with gathers and a small frill trim at the top and tie-top shoulder straps. Seam below the bust and at the hem with wide, tiered flounces.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Regular fit.
Dress in textured jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a decorative flounce around the seams. Unlined.

Knee-length shirt dress in soft washed denim made from Tencel™ lyocell. Collar, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a yoke with pleats at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.

Knee-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an extra-firm, tight fit that focuses on the thighs. The tights create pressure on the legs that is highest at the hems and is gradually reduced towards the top to aid circulation. The special design and high elastane content help the tights to retain their effect and properties over a long period. Elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, mesh key pocket in the waistband and reflective details.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with seamless quilting to provide extra protection from cold air. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring and a zip with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets and one zipped inner pocket. Concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.

Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and a flounce at the shoulders that continues down the front and back. Concealed zip at the back with a button at the back of the neck, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a decorative back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
Top in washed linen with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, and buttons down the front.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Set with a shirt and shorts in a cotton weave. Short-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and detachable satin bow tie with an elastic strap. Shorts with detachable elastic braces, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.

Fully lined, ribbed sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a deep V-neck and removable inserts that shape the bust. Wide, elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide, covered elastication at the hem. Light support.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short, lace cap sleeves.

Cold shoulder blouse in airy plumeti chiffon with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a double-layered flounce at the top. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Leather boots with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Twill linings made from organic cotton, leather insoles and patterned rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Nursing top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, round neck and short, flared sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a print on one side, elasticated lacing at the front and loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Straight T-shirt in soft, airy viscose slub jersey with a deep V-neck.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in soft linen jersey with a V-neck front and back and slits in the sides.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.
Fine-knit jumper in a modal and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck and long sleeves.
Trainers in suede, leather and mesh with a padded edge and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Mesh trainers with rubber details, lacing at the front, and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a lined gusset, high waist with a laser-cut edge, and wide lace trims at the hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend with a button placket and raglan sleeves. The cotton content of the T-shirt is organic.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, loose knit with a wide neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Reversible sun hat in soft cotton jersey with one patterned side and narrow ties at the sides. Width of brim approx. 4 cm.

Jacket in woven fabric with a mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, a stand-up collar and zip down the front. One chest pocket, zipped side pockets, a loose yoke at the back with a mesh section underneath and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Unlined.

Set in soft cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Two long-sleeved tops in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Long-sleeved top in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Two pairs of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. One pair of joggers in jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Sleeveless jersey jumpsuit with a deep neckline at the back, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Oversized jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Oversized jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck front and back, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with closer-fitting cuffs, and slits in the sides.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft matt finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, chin guard and a zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the back of the waist and ribbing containing glittery threads at the cuffs. Lined.
Short, A-line dress in jersey with a lace-crochet collar decorated with sparkly stones and pearly plastic beads. Opening at the top with covered buttons, and long sleeves. Unlined.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with long raglan sleeves.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist. Unlined.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Four pairs of studs, one pair of hoops and two pairs with a pendant. Size from 0.3 cm to 6 cm.
Sleeveless top in sequin-embroidered mesh with a V-neck front and back. Jersey lining.

Small, bucket-style waist bag in crocodile-patterned velvet with an adjustable drawstring at the top, and a metal chain with a carabiner hook and a small charm. Lined. Size 4.5x13x15 cm. Length of chain 85 cm.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Calf-length, straight-cut wrap dress in a soft viscose weave with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, long wide sleeves, a tie belt at the waist and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Dungaree shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket, side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Short wrapover skirt in soft cotton twill. High waist with a concealed button and sewn-in belt with metal rings, and patch pockets with a flap and press-stud. Unlined.
Long earrings in metal and plastic. Length 11.5 cm.
Leggings in cotton jersey with a glittery pattern and a glittery elasticated waistband.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim in a slightly looser fit with an extra high waist, button fly and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Hooded sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric. Zip down the front with a chin guard, kangaroo pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Trousers in an airy cotton weave with a small embroidery detail at the top. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim at the top and decorative bow, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.
